TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GSignalHandler(object o, GSignalArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed GSignalHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the GSignalHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the GSignalHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the GSignalHandler is removed from the event.
